title: The father of the Star of Andrew Lincoln was not a survivor of the 1972 Andes Air disaster.
subtitle: Mimi Zora claims that the father of the star of the "walking dead" was in a 1972 plane crash in the Andes, and survived by eating the other passengers.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The father of Andrew Lincoln was in a 1972 plane crash in the Andes mountain and survived by eating other passengers.
